class_notes:
Offered every semester by special arrangement with a member of the WGSS faculty. Students undertake their own independent research project or assist with the faculty member's on-going research, or some combination thereof. Variable credit: 1 credit hour requires 3-4 hours of research per week. 
Permission from WGSS faculty supervisor required prior to enrollment. Graduate students instructors may not serve as faculty advisor.
